description: Repository interface for FacilityEntity entities, providing data access methods using Spring Data JPA.

classes.name: FacilityRepository
classes.description: JPA repository interface for accessing FacilityEntity instances, extending JpaRepository.

methods.name: findByFacilityTypeAndCode
methods.description: Retrieves a facility entity by its type and code, returning an Optional.

methods.name: findByFacilityTypeAndActive
methods.description: Retrieves a list of facility entities by their type and active status.
